channel.title: Need help changing ip so i can let everyone use client to login
channel.description:
Hello, Im wondering if someone could me help me because i really need help with being able to change the ip to that people could login to my server by the client i have. How could i do this so they could login as the default? please someone help me
P.s. Also could someone help me change names for my Source which is " Torvapkz V2 Source" I would want to change all the wording that says "torvapkz" Thanks to everyone who will help. :)

item.title: Need help changing ip so i can let everyone use client to login
item.dc:creator: @rhys132 rhys132
item.description:
@rhys132 wrote:

ultimatepkvillage:

client.java or gui.java for changing client ip and client.java to change source name search under those txt document files

some people are stupid, i didnt know where or how to change the name, but i had the name so i searched all files until i found out, now i know if i want to change the name i know where to look. (SOME PEOPLE) just looking for an easy way out, life isnt easy.

Read full topic
